about_the_game:
Communication game playing with VR!


Please help her to live alone
  • Her life will change according to the time of the visit.
  • Find her looking things.
  • Use a fan to cool her.
  • Have a good time by talking to her.
  • She gets angry when touches the body she doesn't like.

Story

The cousin you used to play together suddenly came back and started to live next door.
She has grown into a fine, young woman. She is alone, so you are asked to look after her…

Caution

  • Windows 64bit required
  • Supported Language: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
  • This game contains depictions of sexual acts.
  • There is no BGM in this game. It is directing.
  • Although you can enjoy even without VR device, some production will be different.

content_descriptors.notes:
The content of ItazuraVR contains explicit depictions of sexual acts and nudity, as well as strong language and is intended for adults only.
Players can touch her body, but she dislikes it.
With a slow growing love, she can agree and have sex.
All characters appearing in Itazura VR are set to be over 18 years of age.

name: ItazuraVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

*languages with full audio support
